name: High Knees
setup: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart
steps: Drive one knee up toward chest
Quickly switch legs in running motion
Pump arms in opposition to legs
Land softly on balls of feet
Continue alternating at a brisk pace
safety: Start at moderate pace. If knees feel cranky, reduce height or switch to marching in place.

progressions: High knees in place with resistance band

prescriptionHints.notes: Great dynamic warm-up for running or basketball.

joints.notes: Land softly to reduce impact. Keep knees tracking straight.
